name: How we built MUD: An On-chain Kernel for Complex Applications on Ethereum
description: In this talk we'll dive into the internals of MUD from a Solidity perspective. We'll discuss how we implemented 'generics' and which upcoming Solidity features would have made our life easier.

speakers.name: Alvarius
speakers.bio: Alvarius is co-founder of Lattice and one of the core developers of MUD. He's passionate about the emergent behavior of fully onchain games and Autonomous Worlds.
